extension_description.message: Sync Tab Groups are an easy way to organize your current tabs depending on a topic. Each open group is synchronized with a window so that all tabs change are saved. Hence, you can close a current tabs-flow while opening another one.

synchronized_window.description: Label for synchronizing window in popup

open_window_group.description: Hover help for open in new window button

show_tabs.description: Hover help for show tabs in group button

hide_tabs.description: Hover help for hide tabs in group button

undo_removing.description: Hover help for undo removing button

undo_closing.description: Hover help for undo closing button

force_removing.description: Hover help for force removing button

force_closing.description: Hover help for force closing button

open_tab.description: Hover help for open tab button

close_tab.message: Remove Tab and close if opened
close_tab.description: Hover help for open tab button

move_tab_group.description: Name of the menu in the context (right click on tab)

new_window.message: A new opened window creates a new group automatically.

remove_empty_groups.message: Remove the groups with no tabs automatically.

new_private_window.message: A new opened Private window creates a new group automatically.

close_private_window.message: Remove the group in a private window, when this window is closed.

sync_pinned_tabs.message: Add pinned tabs inside the groups (If no, they won't be closed when you switch group)

bookmark_help_folder.message: Bookmarks are saved in OtherBookmarks/SyncTabGroups by default.

bookmark_help_moving.message: For changing the root location, move the SyncTabGroups folder anywhere in your bookmarks.

bookmark_help_session.message: Session name is the subfolder name where bookmarks are saved for this computer.

bookmark_help_precaution.message: Do not have another SyncTabGroups folder.

import_export_help_added.message: Imported groups are added as closed groups

import_export_help_support.message: Import supports: Sync Tab Groups and Tab Groups json file.

privileged_url_help_reason.message: Sync Tab Groups can't open directly privileged URLs for security reason:

open_url_help_method_part_2.message: Paste the URL in the address bar

privileged_url_help_warning.message: Warning: those URLs are closed automatically by Firefox when the extension is updated or disabled.

command_description_create_group_swtich.message: Create a new group and switch to it.

command_description_focus_next_group.message: Focus window with next group opened.

command_description_focus_previous_group.message: Focus window with previous group opened.

command_description_remove_group_swtich.message: Close and remove the current group in window and switch to next one.

icon_option.message: Use white icon instead of black

show_tabs_number.message: Show Tabs number in brackets after the Group title

allow_global_shortcuts.message: Allow extension shortcuts from anywhere in the browser

show_title_window.message: Display the Group Name as a title prefix in all the windows

bookmarks_weak_help.message: Bookmarks auto-save can be very problematic. I would recommend to not use it until I have fixed it

label_select_sorting_type.message: Select sorting option for the groups

label_sort_accessed.description: Name of sorting in select in option page

unpin_tab.description: In context menu on tab in menu

pin_tab.description: In context menu on tab in menu

open_group.message: Click to switch to this group in the current window.
open_group.description: Hover help for open group click

expand_all_groups.description: Hover help for button for expanding all groups (see tabs)

reduce_all_groups.description: Hover help for button for reducing all groups (hide tabs)
